column4: i did sudo apt-get install network-manager-gnome and it seemed to have installed, but when i restarted there were no noticable changes

My pointer bounces when I put it near the edge of my screen. Is there anyway to stop this? Its causing problems for synergy.
dr_willis, like it bounces a few pixels of the edge. Instead of just sitting there
